title: QUICK RED LENTIL CHILI
directions: In a pot over medium-high heat, combine dried red lentils, water, fire-roasted tomatoes, frozen bell peppers and chili powder.
Bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer. Simmer until lentils are soft and chili thickens (usually about 20 minutes).
As the chili cooks, slice open the avocado, twist open, remove pit and scoop out flesh.
Toast the bread and spread avocado on each slice. Add a dash of black pepper, if desired. Serve alongside chili and enjoy!
ingredients: No-salt canned fire roasted tomatoes1/2 can
